actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code to authorize a tuition assistance program for enlisted members of the National Guard and the Selected Reserve of the Ready Reserve.

summary.text: Authorizes a tuition assistance program for enlisted members of the National Guard and the Selected Reserve of the Ready Reserve. Prescribes the amounts of such tuition assistance.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code to authorize a tuition assistance program for enlisted members of the National Guard and the Selected Reserve of the Ready Reserve.
